variable.label: Install WebUI on Frontend
variable.name: perfSONAR_UI
variable.help: If checked, the perfSONAR WebUI will be installed on your frontend. Otherwise just networking test support tools like iperf, owamp, nuttcp and others will be installed. The perfSONAR attribute can be set for any node that desires the perfSONAR WebUI

variable.label: do NOT Install WebUI on Frontend
variable.name: perfSONAR_UI
variable.help: If checked, the perfSONAR WebUI will not be installed on your frontend. Only networking test support tools like iperf, owamp, nuttcp and others will be installed.
